entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
